content:
'use strict'

const Macroable = require('macroable');

/**
 * adonis-framework
 *
 * (c) Harminder Virk <virk@adonisjs.com>
 *
 * For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
 * file that was distributed with this source code.
 */

const _ = require('lodash')
const requireAll = require('require-all')
const debug = require('debug')('adonis:framework')

/**
 * Manages configuration by recursively reading all
 * `.js` files from the `config` folder.
 *
 * @alias Config
 * @binding Lesswork/Config
 * @group Core
 * @singleton
 *
 * @class Config
 * @constructor
 *
 * @param {String} configPath Absolute path from where to load the config files from
 */
class Config extends Macroable {
  constructor(configPath) {
    super()

    this._configPath = configPath
    this._config = {}
    this.syncWithFileSystem()
  }

  /**
   * Syncs the in-memory config store with the
   * file system. Ideally you should keep your
   * config static and never update the file
   * system on the fly.
   *
   * @method syncWithFileSystem
   *
   * @return {void}
   */
  syncWithFileSystem() {
    try {
      this._config = requireAll({
        dirname: this._configPath,
        filter: /(.*)\.js$/
      })
      debug('loaded all config files from %s', this._configPath)
    } catch (error) {
      if (error.code !== 'ENOENT') {
        throw error
      }
    }
  }

  /**
   * Get value for a given key from the config store. Nested
   * values can be accessed via (dot notation). Values
   * referenced with `self::` are further resolved.
   *
   * @method get
   *
   * @param  {String} key
   * @param  {Mixed} [defaultValue]
   *
   * @return {Mixed}
   *
   * @example
   * ```
   * Config.get('database.mysql')
   *
   * // referenced
   * {
   *   prodMysql: 'self::database.mysql'
   * }
   * Config.get('database.prodMysql')
   * ```
   */
  get(key, defaultValue) {
    return _.get(this._config, key, defaultValue)
  }

  /**
   * Merge default values with the resolved values.
   * This is to provide a default set of values
   * when it does not exists. This method uses
   * lodash `_.mergeWith` method.
   *
   * @method merge
   *
   * @param  {String}   key
   * @param  {Object}   defaultValues
   * @param  {Function} [customizer]
   *
   * @return {Object}
   *
   * @example
   * ```js
   * Config.merge('services.redis', {
   *   port: 6379,
   *   host: 'localhost'
   * })
   * ```
   */
  merge(key, defaultValues, customizer) {
    const value = this.get(key, {})
    return _.mergeWith(defaultValues, value, customizer)
  }

  /**
   * Update value for a given key inside the config store. If
   * value does not exists it will be created.
   *
   * ## Note
   * This method updates the value in memory and not on the
   * file system.
   *
   * @method set
   *
   * @param  {String} key
   * @param  {Mixed}  value
   *
   * @example
   * ```js
   * Config.set('database.mysql.host', '127.0.0.1')
   *
   * // later get the value
   * Config.get('database.mysql.host')
   * ```
   */
  set(key, value) {
    _.set(this._config, key, value)
  }
}

module.exports = Config

description:
adonis-framework

(c) Harminder Virk <virk@adonisjs.com>

For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
file that was distributed with this source code.

name: Config
description:
Manages configuration by recursively reading all
`.js` files from the `config` folder.

params.name: configPath
params.description: Absolute path from where to load the config files from

name: syncWithFileSystem
description:
Syncs the in-memory config store with the
file system. Ideally you should keep your
config static and never update the file
system on the fly.

name: get
description:
Get value for a given key from the config store. Nested
values can be accessed via (dot notation). Values
referenced with `self::` are further resolved.

name: merge
description:
Merge default values with the resolved values.
This is to provide a default set of values
when it does not exists. This method uses
lodash `_.mergeWith` method.

name: set
description:
Update value for a given key inside the config store. If
value does not exists it will be created.

## Note
This method updates the value in memory and not on the
file system.
examples:
```js
Config.set('database.mysql.host', '127.0.0.1')

// later get the value
Config.get('database.mysql.host')
```

adonis-framework

For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE

name: Env
description:
Manages the application environment variables by
reading the `.env` file from the project root.

If `.env` file is missing, an exception will be thrown
to supress the exception, pass `ENV_SILENT=true` when
starting the app.

Can define different location by setting `ENV_PATH`
environment variable.

name: _interpolate
description: Replacing dynamic values inside .env file

name: load
description: Load env file from a given location.

name: getEnvPath
description:
Returns the path from where the `.env`
file should be loaded.

name: get
description:
Get value for a given key from the `process.env`
object.

name: set
description:
Set value for a given key inside the `process.env`
object. If value exists, will be updated

name: src/Event/index.js
EventEmitter2
description:
adonis-framework

(c) Harminder Virk <virk@adonisjs.com>

For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
file that was distributed with this source code.

name: Event
description: Event Class

name: _resolveHandler
description:
here we resolve the handler from the IoC container
or the actual callback if a closure was passed.

name: _bindInstance
description:
here we bind the instance to the method, only
if it exists.

name: _wrapGenerator
description:
here we wrap the generator method using co.wrap
and make sure to pass the instance to the
method.

name: _makeHandler
description:
here we make the handler method with correct context and
execution type. It makes it possible to use generator
methods and other methods as event handler.

name: getListeners
description: returns an array of listeners for a specific event

name: hasListeners
description:
it should tell whether there are any listeners
for a given event or not.

name: wildcard
description: returns the status for wildcard

name: removeListener
description:
removes a named handler for a given event from the
emitter

name: removeListeners
description: removes all listeners for a given or all events

name: emit
description:
emits a given event and passes all the data
to the handler

name: any
description: binds an handler to any event

name: times
description: defines a limit for a listener to be executed

name: on
description: adds a new event listen for a specific event

name: once
description:
adds a new event listen for a specific event
to be ran only for one time.

name: src/Exception/index.js
RuntimeException
description: RuntimeException Class

name: defaultErrorCode
description:
default error code to be used for raising
exceptions

name: missingRouteAction
description:
this exception is thrown when a route action is referenced
inside a view but not registered within the routes file.

name: missingRoute
description:
this exception is thrown when a route is referenced inside
a view but not registered within the routes file.

name: invalidEncryptionMac
description:
this exceptions is raised when mac is invalid when
trying to encrypt data

name: invalidEncryptionPayload
description: this exception is raised when encryption payload is not valid

name: malformedJSON
description:
this exception is raised when expected value is
not a valid json object.

name: fileDeleted
description:
this exception is raised when an operation is attempted
on a file that has been deleted

name: decryptFailed
description:
this exception is raised when encryption class is not
able to decrypt a given piece of data

name: invalidEncryptionCipher
description:
this exception is raised when the encryption cipher is
not supported or app key length is not in-sync with
given cipher

name: missingAppKey
description:
this exception is raised when app key is missing
inside config/app.js file.

name: invalidSessionDriver
description:
this exception is raised when an uknown
session driver is used

name: missingNamedMiddleware
description:
this exception is raised when a named middleware is used
but not registered

name: defaultErrorCode
description:
default error code to be used for raising
exceptions

name: missingParameter
description:
this exception is raised when a method parameter is
missing but expected to exist.

name: invalidParameter
description:
this exception is raised when a method parameter value
is invalid.

name: missingEvent
description:
this exception is raised when unable to find
an event with a given name

content:
# lesswork-framework
A nodejs based framework for serverless applications.

# Official Website
Visit [lesswork.io](https://lesswork.io) for information on how to install and use this framework.

# Goal
The goal of this framework is to simplify the requirements to successfully build and deploy a nodejs based serverless application on aws.

* Testing
* Deployment
* Authorization
* Commands
* Responses 
* Database ORM
* Configs
* Environments
* Documentation

And more...
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "lesswork-framework",
  "version": "0.0.29",
  "description": "A nodejs based framework for serverless applications.",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "make:docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/lessworkjs/framework.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "aws",
    "serverless",
    "framework"
  ],
  "author": "William Bowman",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/lessworkjs/framework/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/lessworkjs/framework#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "adonis-binding-resolver": "^1.0.1",
    "adonis-fold": "3.0.3",
    "child_process": "^1.0.2",
    "lesswork-cmd": "^5.0.7",
    "nyc": "^11.6.0",
    "serverless-aws-documentation": "^1.0.1",
    "serverless-mocha-plugin": "^1.7.0",
    "serverless-offline": "^3.18.0",
    "require-all": "^2.2.0",
    "macroable": "^1.0.0",
    "pretty-error": "^2.1.1",
    "intl-messageformat": "^2.2.0",
    "intl": "^1.2.5"
  }
}
